name: refrigerationTemperature_getValue
description: This function is used to retrieve the current temperature of the refrigerator's refrigerating compartment.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to get the temperature.

parameters.name: predefinedCompartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment to get the temperature (e.g., refrigerating compartment).
